name: OscilloCat
description: OscilloCat is a robotic oscilloscope with a unique twist. Its vibrant orange box, adorned with soldier-themed buttons and arms and legs, makes it stand out from the crowd. The screen of this remarkable robot displays an adorable cat, adding a touch of charm to its electronic features. OscilloCat also comes equipped with a sturdy helmet addon, ensuring its safety during its adventures as part of the WebtrES club.
